metadata.title: Display resolutions that are supported by the RZ/G2L and RZ/G2LC (Portrait LCD)

sections.content:
Question:
The RZ/G2L manual lists the supported display resolution as 1920 x 1080 pixels, but is it possible to display 1080 x 1920 pixels by swapping the height and width?
Answer:
Yes, 1080 x 1920 is also supported.
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L, RZ/G2LC
